page.title: 03WHAT WE EAT
page.content: We thought that people in other countries and other decades might be interested and amused or even shocked by the amount and sorts of food we eat and drink. This is a diary of what the average Junior Shool pupil ate in 52 weeks, 1 year. 1092 cups of tea, 728 cans of soft drink(shandy was the favourite). 728 slices of cake, 104 packets of biscuits(chocolate was the favourite), 208 ice creams (mint favourite),728 packets of crisps and savoury snacks (least popular flavour, plain). 1820 slices of bread and toast, 260, packets of chips and 156 eggs. Our favourite vegetable was carrots and our favourite meal, sausage and mash. We plan to work out how many kilos of food we eat in 365 days.....which should stagger you and us.
